examples: The participants in the swimsuit competition are all very sexy .

definitions.definition: ( of a thing or concept ) Intriguing , appealing , likely to excite interest .
examples: The manufacturers have launched a sexy new car.
We have some sexy ideas on how to improve sales.
Being an undertaker is not a sexy career.

definitions.definition: ( rare ) Sexual ; relating to or involving sex .
examples: He didn't really like me; all he wanted was for me to be sexy with him.

secondary_definitions: ( of a thing or concept ) Intriguing , appealing , likely to excite interest .
( rare ) Sexual ; relating to or involving sex .

definitions.definition: Used to describe prime numbers that differ from each other by six .

main_definition: ( mathematics ) Used to describe prime numbers that differ from each other by six .
